effects.name: Akh Afah (pretend boss health is equal)

MortalVow.statusDescription: Condemned by Nidhogg's vow to avenge his brood-sister.

MortalAtonement.statusDescription: No longer condemned by Nidhogg's Mortal Vow.

Freezing.statusDescription: Body is slowly turning to ice. Will experience a Deep Freeze when this effect expires.

Boiling.statusDescription: Body is slowly heating up. Will become Pyretic when this effect expires.

Frozen.statusDescription: Frozen solid and unable to execute actions.

Pyretic.statusDescription: Fire-aspected damage is taken with every action.

LightDot.statusDescription: Light is causing damage over time.

DarkDot.statusDescription: Darkness is causing damage over time.
